type.help: If your home attendant provides any health care services, choose "HOME HEALTH CARE WORKER". If they do not provide any health care services, choose "HOME ATTENDANT".

agency.q: Is your employee paid through an agency?

books.q: Are you paying your employee on the books?
books.help: To be in compliance, you would need to have unemployment, disability, worker's compensation, PFL insurance in place and paying taxes. If you're paying taxes, but your employee does not qualify for disability, workers compensation or PFL, or you don't carry them, choose "YES, PARTIALLY".

hours per week.q: How many hours per week did your employee work before the stay-at-home order?

length of employment.q: How long has your employee worked for you?

hours per year.q: In that time, how many hours did they work (per year, if more than one)?

self-quarantine.q: Are they in quarantine because of known or suspected COVID-19?

family quarantine.q: Are they caring for a family member because of known or suspected COVID-19?
family quarantine.help: Under NYC law, a family member is anyone you consider family.  Under NY state, a family member includes: "...".  Under federal law, family is not clearly defined. Answer YES if any of these apply.
